import axios from"axios";import{GET_ALL_USERS_FAILURE,GET_ALL_USERS_REQUEST,GET_ALL_USERS_SUCCESS,FIND_USER_BY_FAILURE,FIND_USER_BY_REQUEST,FIND_USER_BY_SUCCESS,FIND_USER_BY_EMAIL_FAILURE,FIND_USER_BY_EMAIL_REQUEST,FIND_USER_BY_EMAIL_SUCCESS,BAN_SUCCESS,BAN_FAILURE,BAN_REQUEST,CHANGE_ROLE_SUCCESS,CHANGE_ROLE_FAILURE,CHANGE_ROLE_REQUEST}from"../../types";import{alertSuccess,alertFailure}from"./alert";var baseURL="/api/v1/users";export var getAllUsersRequest=function getAllUsersRequest(){return{type:GET_ALL_USERS_REQUEST};};export var getAllUsersSuccess=function getAllUsersSuccess(users){return{type:GET_ALL_USERS_SUCCESS,payload:{users:users}};};export var getAllUsersFailure=function getAllUsersFailure(error){return{type:GET_ALL_USERS_FAILURE,payload:{error:error}};};export var getAllUsers=function getAllUsers(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(getAllUsersRequest());axios({method:"get",url:baseURL,headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem("USER-TOKEN"))}}).then(function(response){var users=response.data;dispatch(getAllUsersSuccess(users));}).catch(function(error){dispatch(getAllUsersFailure(error.response.data.message));});};};// Ban User
export var banRequest=function banRequest(){return{type:BAN_REQUEST};};export var banSuccess=function banSuccess(user){return{type:BAN_SUCCESS,payload:{user:user}};};export var banFailure=function banFailure(error){return{type:BAN_FAILURE,payload:{error:error}};};export var banUser=function banUser(email,history){return function(dispatch){dispatch(banRequest());axios({method:"put",url:"".concat(baseURL,"/ban"),headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem("USER-TOKEN"))},data:{email:email}}).then(function(response){var user=response.data;console.log(response.data);dispatch(banSuccess(user));dispatch(alertSuccess("User Banned successfully"));history.push("/users");}).catch(function(error){dispatch(banFailure(error.response.data.message));dispatch(alertFailure(error.response.data.message));});};};// Update Role
export var changeRoleRequest=function changeRoleRequest(){return{type:CHANGE_ROLE_REQUEST};};export var changeRoleSuccess=function changeRoleSuccess(user){return{type:CHANGE_ROLE_SUCCESS,payload:{user:user}};};export var changeRoleFailure=function changeRoleFailure(error){return{type:CHANGE_ROLE_FAILURE,payload:{error:error}};};export var changeUserRole=function changeUserRole(email,history){return function(dispatch){dispatch(changeRoleRequest());axios({method:"put",url:"".concat(baseURL,"/role"),headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem("USER-TOKEN"))},data:{email:email}}).then(function(response){var user=response.data;console.log(response.data);dispatch(changeRoleSuccess(user));dispatch(alertSuccess("User role updated successfully"));history.push("/users");}).catch(function(error){dispatch(changeRoleFailure(error));});};};//find User action
export var getUserByIdRequest=function getUserByIdRequest(){return{type:FIND_USER_BY_REQUEST};};export var getUserByIdSuccess=function getUserByIdSuccess(id){return{type:FIND_USER_BY_SUCCESS,payload:{id:id}};};export var getUserByIdFailure=function getUserByIdFailure(error){return{type:FIND_USER_BY_FAILURE,payload:{error:error}};};export var getUserById=function getUserById(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch(getUserByIdRequest());axios({method:"get",url:"".concat(baseURL,"/").concat(id),headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem("USER-TOKEN"))},data:id}).then(function(response){var res=response.data;dispatch(getUserByIdSuccess(res));}).catch(function(error){dispatch(getUserByIdFailure(error));});};};//find User action
export var getUserByEmailRequest=function getUserByEmailRequest(){return{type:FIND_USER_BY_EMAIL_REQUEST};};export var getUserByEmailSuccess=function getUserByEmailSuccess(email){return{type:FIND_USER_BY_EMAIL_SUCCESS,payload:{email:email}};};export var getUserByEmailFailure=function getUserByEmailFailure(error){return{type:FIND_USER_BY_EMAIL_FAILURE,payload:{error:error}};};export var getUserByEmail=function getUserByEmail(email){return function(dispatch){dispatch(getUserByEmailRequest());axios({method:"get",url:"".concat(baseURL,"/email"),headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem("USER-TOKEN"))},data:email}).then(function(response){var res=response.data;dispatch(getUserByEmailSuccess(res));}).catch(function(error){dispatch(getUserByEmailFailure(error));});};};
